body.p: “On one large slate (?) rock with a smooth surface “,” sloping toward the pond at high-water mark “,” were some inscriptions or sculptures which R. had copied about ten years since “,” thus: --
The ‘B. Hill’ is comparatively modern. R. said that Israel Felix was an old Indian preacher”
PE 9, pg. 473 / 3 Sept 1854 – 12 May 1855 / NNPM MA 1302:24 / T vol. # XVIII / PDF # XIII
